hero.selfDescription: I'm Rafael, a Software Engineer and Fullstack Developer. I create scalable code and solutions, and I love doing it.

about.title: About me
about.text: I consider myself analytical, committed, and results-oriented. I always prioritize the quality of my deliverables and continually seek new knowledge to enhance my skills. I have experience in web development, scripting, enhancements, and innovations for FiveM, microservices, integrations, and distributed systems architecture. At Trigueiro Network, I have the opportunity to put my knowledge into practice and implement scalable solutions, code standards, and revolutionize systems that previously had various limitations.

interests.title: Interests
interests.paragraph: Some things I enjoy learning about and doing

elements.title: Euro Moeda
elements.description: In this project, I was responsible for developing all the front-end parts and deployment. By consuming Web APIs to keep currency values up to date, I created currency converters and charts. I registered a domain and deployed the application.

elements.title: Metaverso FiveM Driving School
elements.description: In this immersive driving school, I was responsible for integrating the front-end with the back-end and providing functionality to it. I also created all the steps and functionality for practical exams for all vehicle categories.
elements.imgAlt: This is a ghost loading image.

elements.title: Metaverso FiveM ID Exchange
elements.description: This was a project I took over that had bugs and unnecessary complexity. I restructured the application's logic, making it much more straightforward and simple, facilitating code maintenance, and optimizing the process of database changes. I also trained the installation team to understand how it should be properly tailored to clients and their needs.
elements.imgAlt: This is a ghost loading image.

elements.title: React Boilerplate for CEF
elements.description: In this project, I was responsible for creating a scalable solution that was easy for the front-end to use in development and for the back-end to integrate. Since React is not natively compatible with the CEF (Chromium Embedded Framework), something was needed to make the development process more agile for everyone.
elements.imgAlt: This is a ghost loading image.
